item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://suja.vues.in.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Fresh, Traditional,
and Delivered to Your Doorstep

Order Now

Celebrate Onam
with Our Special Feast!

Suja's Onam Sadhya offers authentic Kerala flavors crafted with love by Suja herself. For over 20 years, we’ve brought the taste of home to the UAE. Fresh ingredients, traditional recipes, and hygienic packaging—all for just AED 49. Celebrate Onam with a feast that feels like home!

Behind the Scenes,
Crafting Exquisite Dishes

Explore Our Kitchen

Exceptional Catering
Services for Every Occasion

Explore Our Catering

Why Us?

We Offer Unmatched Quality and Service 

Customer Satisfaction 0 % Varitey Of Dishes 0 + Food Outlets 0 Maintaining Consistency 0 *

Suja's Kitchen

A heritage of
Kerala cuisine.

In 1999, Mrs. Suja Alex, a passionate mother and visionary entrepreneur, embarked on a culinary journey that began from her humble home kitchen. Since then, Suja’s Kitchen has consistently been a purveyor of joy and comfort, captivating hearts through its exquisite culinary services rooted in simplicity and tradition.

Certifications

Customer Reviews

What they like about us!

Peeshu★★★★★ I have been a regular customer with Suja’s kitchen especially ordering their dishes for festive occasions. And I love how it’s been consistent with taste and packaging. I would highly recommend everyone to try them out. Bobby Babu★★★★★ I had ordered fish curry meals via noon from Sujas kitchen...very delicious and I could make out that each dish prepared with care and with right ingredients, very hygienic and well packed. I am extremely satisfied with the food..had called them and congratulated the cook.. Dimple Mehbubani★★★★★ I always love to try new dishes & this time ordered food from Sujas kitchen - they have an authentic taste of Kerala food & me, my family enjoyed the meal especially chicken tikka, Pudding, Tapioca & Appam. If you are a food lover & want to try Kerala meals - Do try Sujas Kitchen. Ajay Ayyappan★★★★★ The food was properly and neatly packed to ensure that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. The Appam and Beef Roast was the best combination. the chicken cutlets were rightly spiced. Angel law (Foodieangelgirl)★★★★★ Delivery of the food is on a timely basis, the food was properly and neatly packed to ensue that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. the Appam and chicken curry was the best combination. the chicken cutlets was rightly spiced.

Flavors of Kerala with Our Signature Fish Curry

"Indulge in our signature Kerala Style Fish Curry, crafted with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and a blend of traditional spices."

Explore Our Menu

Now Available on

Discover authentic South Indian recipes, curated by Suja's Kitchen. Enjoy traditional dishes, regional delicacies, and mouthwatering desserts. Bring the flavours of South India to your home with our culinary delights

What they like about us!

Peeshu
★★★★★
I have been a regular customer with Suja’s kitchen especially ordering their dishes for festive occasions. And I love how it’s been consistent with taste and packaging. I would highly recommend everyone to try them out.
Bobby Babu
★★★★★
I had ordered fish curry meals via noon from Sujas kitchen...very delicious and I could make out that each dish prepared with care and with right ingredients, very hygienic and well packed. I am extremely satisfied with the food..had called them and congratulated the cook..
Dimple Mehbubani
★★★★★
I always love to try new dishes & this time ordered food from Sujas kitchen - they have an authentic taste of Kerala food & me, my family enjoyed the meal especially chicken tikka, Pudding, Tapioca & Appam. If you are a food lover & want to try Kerala meals - Do try Sujas Kitchen.
Ajay Ayyappan
★★★★★
The food was properly and neatly packed to ensure that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. The Appam and Beef Roast was the best combination. the chicken cutlets were rightly spiced.
Angel law (Foodieangelgirl)
★★★★★
Delivery of the food is on a timely basis, the food was properly and neatly packed to ensue that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. the Appam and chicken curry was the best combination. the chicken cutlets was rightly spiced.

Order your favourite Kerala food now! #food #kerala #keralafood #uae" width="800" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/84swrtafg3A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Authentic Kerala Cuisine in Dubai & Abu Dhabi

Experience the authentic flavours of Kerala with Suja's Kitchen. Fresh, home-style Kerala dishes delivered to your doorstep in Dubai and Abu Dhabi, made with locally sourced ingredients to bring true tradition to your table

item.title: Catering
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Suja’s Kitchen

Catering Services

Discover the Details

Tailored Culinary Experiences for Every Occasion

At Suja’s Kitchen, we believe that every gathering, whether small or large, deserves a menu as unique as the event itself. Our catering division goes beyond traditional Kerala cuisine to offer a diverse selection of Chinese, North Indian, Arabic, and Continental dishes. We take pride in customizing menus that blend these culinary traditions, ensuring a memorable dining experience tailored to your specific needs.

Our Culinary Offerings

Indian Cuisine

Indian cuisine is more than just food; it’s an experience of bold, vibrant flavors that evoke the spirit of India. From the creamy indulgence of butter chicken to the spiced allure of biryani, our dishes are crafted with care, bringing the familiar warmth of home to every plate. It’s the food that brings people together, cherished by the Indian community in the UAE and beyond.

View Menu

Arabic Cuisine

Step into a world of warmth and hospitality with our Arabic cuisine, where every dish tells a story of the Middle East. Whether it’s the smoky aroma of grilled kebabs or the rich, comforting flavors of lamb stew, our menu brings the heart of Arabic cooking to life. Perfect for gatherings, each bite is a celebration of the UAE’s rich cultural tapestry, where tradition meets taste.

View Menu

Chinese Cuisine

Chinese cuisine at Suja’s Kitchen is all about balance—sweet, savory, crispy, and tender, all in one bite. Whether you’re savoring a comforting bowl of fried rice or enjoying the delicate crunch of spring rolls, our Chinese dishes are a tribute to the beloved flavors that have become a staple in UAE dining. It’s the kind of food that feels like an old friend—always there, always satisfying.

View Menu

Continental Cuisine

For those who crave a taste of the West, our Continental cuisine offers a delightful escape. Think of creamy pastas, succulent steaks, and fresh salads that transport you to a cozy European bistro. It’s comfort food with a touch of elegance, perfect for those moments when you want to savor something familiar yet refined, right here in the UAE.

View Menu

View Menu

Why Us?

We Offer Unmatched Quality and Service 

Customer Satisfaction 0 % Varitey Of Dishes 0 + New Outlets 0 Maintaining Consistency 0 *

Make your next event unforgettable with Suja’s Kitchen

Order Now

Highlights from Our Kitchen

Our Customers

Customer Reviews

What they like about us!

Peeshu I have been a regular customer with Suja’s kitchen especially ordering their dishes for festive occasions. And I love how it’s been consistent with taste and packaging. I would highly recommend everyone to try them out. Bobby Babu I had ordered fish curry meals via noon from Sujas kitchen...very delicious and I could make out that each dish prepared with care and with right ingredients, very hygienic and well packed. I am extremely satisfied with the food..had called them and congratulated the cook.. Dimple Mehbubani I always love to try new dishes & this time ordered food from Sujas kitchen - they have an authentic taste of Kerala food & me, my family enjoyed the meal especially chicken tikka, Pudding, Tapioca & Appam. If you are a food lover & want to try Kerala meals - Do try Sujas Kitchen. Delivery was so quick. Ajay Ayyappan The food was properly and neatly packed to ensure that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. The Appam and Beef Roast was the best combination. the chicken cutlets were rightly spiced. The Rice payasam was sweet but not too sweet and was the best way to end this delightful meal. Highly Recommended. Angel law (Foodieangelgirl) Delivery of the food is on a timely basis, the food was properly and neatly packed to ensue that there is no Spillage. Kappa and red spicy fish curry was on point and was packed with flavor and the fish was soft and flaky. the Appam and chicken curry was the best combination. the chicken cutlets was rightly spiced. The Rice payasam was sweet but not too sweet and was the best way to end this delightful meal. defiantly recommend to try fro Kerala home cooked style food.

Suja's Kitchen offers authentic South Indian catering services for weddings, corporate events, and private parties. Enjoy traditional vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes from Kerala, and beyond, tailored to delight your guests with rich flavours and quality ingredients

item.title: Our Story
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Our Story

Discover the Journey Behind Suja's Kitchen

Suja's Kitchen

A Heritage
of Kerala Cuisine.

"In 1999, Mrs. Suja Alex began a journey that would bring the rich, authentic flavors of Kerala to the UAE. What started as a simple dream in her home kitchen has now evolved into Suja's Kitchen—a brand that not only serves as a beacon of Kerala’s culinary heritage but also caters to the diverse needs of our growing community."

The Evolution of Suja's Kitchen

Behind the Scenes,
Crafting Exquisite Dishes

Our cloud kitchen is the heart of Suja’s Kitchen, dedicated to delivering the authentic taste of Kerala right to your doorstep. Operating in both Dubai and now Abu Dhabi, our kitchen specializes in traditional Kerala cuisine, prepared with the freshest ingredients and a commitment to quality. From the comfort of your home, you can experience the true essence of Kerala, as our dishes are crafted with the same love and care that Mrs. Suja herself put into every meal.

Explore Our Kitchen

Exceptional Catering Services for Every Occasion

At Suja’s Kitchen, we believe that no gathering is too small to be special. Whether it’s an intimate dinner party or a grand celebration, our catering division is your go-to for making any event memorable. With the philosophy that whenever there’s a gathering of five or more, you should think of Suja’s, we offer customized menus that bring the vibrant flavors of Kerala to your table. From family get-togethers to corporate events, our catering services ensure that every guest leaves with a taste of tradition and a smile on their face.

Explore Our Catering

Behind the Scenes,
Crafting Exquisite Dishes

Our cloud kitchen is the heart of Suja’s Kitchen, dedicated to delivering the authentic taste of Kerala right to your doorstep. Operating in both Dubai and now Abu Dhabi, our kitchen specializes in traditional Kerala cuisine, prepared with the freshest ingredients and a commitment to quality. From the comfort of your home, you can experience the true essence of Kerala, as our dishes are crafted with the same love and care that Mrs. Suja herself put into every meal.

Explore Our Kitchen

Exceptional Catering Services for Every Occasion

At Suja's Kitchen, we believe that no gathering is too small to be special. Whether it's an intimate dinner party or a grand celebration, our catering division is your go-to for making any event memorable. With the philosophy that whenever there’s a gathering of five or more, you should think of Suja’s, we offer customized menus that bring the vibrant flavors of Kerala to your table. From family get-togethers to corporate events, our catering services ensure that every guest leaves with a taste of tradition and a smile on their face.

Explore Our Catering

Our Objectives

What We Stand For!

At Suja’s Kitchen, our mission is to craft unforgettable culinary experiences that exceed your expectations. Whether you're hosting an intimate gathering or a grand event, our dedicated team ensures every detail is meticulously planned and flawlessly executed, so you can focus on what truly matters. With over two decades of expertise, we continue to uphold a legacy of excellence, leaving a lasting impression on your guests.

Tailored Menus

Every dish reflects your unique
vision and tastes.

Exceptional Service

We pride ourselves on delivering
unparalleled service.

Attention to Detail

From food to venue, every
detail is curated.

Legacy of Excellence

Our reputation for outstanding culinary experiences speaks for itself.

Explore a World of Flavors

Indulge in a diverse menu that blends the authentic tastes of Kerala with global culinary delights.

Our Blog

Culinary Delights

The Art of Kerala Cuisine: A Culinary Journey

Dive into the rich culinary heritage of Kerala, exploring traditional dishes, unique cooking techniques, and the cultural significance behind them.

Know More

Secrets of the Perfect Kerala Style Fish Curry

Unveil the secrets behind our signature Kerala Style Fish Curry. From selecting the freshest fish to mastering the blend of spices.

Explore the health benefits of traditional Kerala ingredients such as coconut, turmeric etc. Learn how these ingredients contribute to a balanced diet

Authentic South Indian Recipes & Regional Cuisines

Discover the Suja's Kitchen blog for authentic South Indian recipes, traditional vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, and regional delicacies from Kerala. Experience the rich flavours of South India with easy-to-follow recipes.

item.title: Menu
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Our Menu

A Culinary Journey Through Diverse Flavors

Arabic Cuisine

Step into a world of warmth and hospitality with our Arabic cuisine, where every dish tells a story of the Middle East. Whether it’s the smoky aroma of grilled kebabs or the rich, comforting flavors of lamb stew, our menu brings the heart of Arabic cooking to life. Perfect for gatherings, each bite is a celebration of the UAE’s rich cultural tapestry, where tradition meets taste.

View Menu

North Indian Cuisine

North Indian cuisine is more than just food; it’s an experience of bold, vibrant flavors that evoke the spirit of India. From the creamy indulgence of butter chicken to the spiced allure of biryani, our dishes are crafted with care, bringing the familiar warmth of home to every plate. It’s the food that brings people together, cherished by the Indian community in the UAE and beyond.

View Menu

Chineese Cuisine

Chinese cuisine at Suja’s Kitchen is all about balance- sweet, savory, crispy, and tender, all in one bite. Whether you’re savoring a comforting bowl of fried rice or enjoying the delicate crunch of spring rolls, our Chinese dishes are a tribute to the beloved flavors that have become a staple in UAE dining. It’s the kind of food that feels like an old friend—always there, always satisfying.

View Menu

Continental Cuisine

For those who crave a taste of the West, our Continental cuisine offers a delightful escape. Think of creamy pastas, succulent steaks, and fresh salads that transport you to a cozy European bistro. It’s comfort food with a touch of elegance, perfect for those moments when you want to savor something familiar yet refined, right here in the UAE.

View Menu

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Banquet
item.dc:creator: codesteak
item.content:encoded:
Banquets

Celebrate Life’s Moments.

From intimate home gatherings to grand corporate events, we bring your vision to life with customized setups, exceptional service and unforgettable experiences.

  • +971 5284 07397

Why Choose Us?

Banquets Designed for Perfection, Every Time

Every event deserves perfection. With flexible spaces, expert planning, and exceptional service, we ensure a seamless and memorable experience tailored to your vision.

  • Flexible spaces and setups tailored to your needs.
  • Expert planners to make every detail flawless.
  • Premium catering options to suit every palate.
  • Reliable and professional service for seamless events.
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/xARlMBCMAac

Services We Offer

Banquet Solutions for All Occasions

From intimate home gatherings to grand celebrations, we offer seamless banquet solutions for every occasion. With expert planning, elegant setups, and top-notch service, we ensure your event is nothing short of extraordinary.

Home Events

  • Cozy and intimate setups for birthdays, anniversaries, baby showers and more.
  • Tailored to fit your home space with minimal hassle.

Corporate Gatherings

  • Professional setups for meetings, seminars, team-building events and annual galas.
  • Equipped with audio-visual arrangements, buffet spreads and professional service.

Large-Scale Events

  • Cozy and intimate setups for birthdays, anniversaries, baby showers and more.
  • Tailored to fit your home space with minimal hassle.

Customer Reviews

What they like about us!

Peeshu★★★★★ The team went above and beyond to make our family dinner special. The setup was stunning, and the food was perfect! Bobby Babu★★★★★ Our corporate annual meet was a huge success thanks to their impeccable service and seamless arrangements!

Our Process

How It Works

Planning your perfect event has never been easier. Our streamlined process ensures a stress-free experience, from the initial consultation to flawless execution. Just share your vision, and we’ll take care of the rest!

Consultation

Share your vision, needs, and preferences.

Custom Planning

We’ll design the perfect setup tailored to your occasion.

Flawless Execution

Sit back and relax while we handle everything from start to finish.

Let’s Make Your Event Unforgettable!

Whether you’re planning a cozy family celebration, a professional corporate gathering, or a lavish event, we’re here to make it extraordinary.

Book Your Banquet Now

Book Now

Request a Free Consultation

Request Now

Contact us

Your inquiry has been successfully submitted, and our team
will get back to you as soon as possible.

item.title: Delicious, home-style meals delivered to your office—fresh, on time, and tailored to your needs.
item.dc:creator: Sujas
item.content:encoded:
Catering

Corporate Catering That Works as Hard as You Do

Why Choose Us?

At Suja’s Kitchen, we believe food has the power to bring people together. That’s why we craft every meal with warmth, care, and the kind of flavor that reminds you of home. Whether it’s a busy workday lunch or a thoughtful spread for your next team event, we’re here to nourish your team with food that feels good and tastes even better.

  • Fresh, healthy food made with love
  • On-time delivery, professionally packed
  • Flexible plans tailored to your company’s size
  • Trusted by top teams across industries
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/X01xZnO2Tys

Services We Offer

A Taste of Suja’s Kitchen

From flavorful biryanis and comforting Kerala meals to crisp salads and fusion dishes, Suja’s Kitchen serves up a variety of crowd-pleasers with authentic taste and a homemade touch. Our rotating menu keeps things exciting while delivering nutritional balance and satisfaction in every bite.

Daily Office Lunches

Executive Meeting Meals

Event & Team Catering

Custom Menus | Vegetarian & Non-Vegetarian Options

Affordable Packages for All Team Sizes

Customer Reviews

What they like about us!

Priya S., HR Manager, TechCorp★★★★★ "Suja’s meals are the highlight of our office lunch hours - delicious, healthy, and always on time." Anil M., Operations Head, BrightWorks★★★★★ "Their catering made our team event feel extra special with professional service and truly memorable food."

Our Process

How It Works

Planning your perfect event has never been easier. Our streamlined process ensures a stress-free experience, from the initial consultation to flawless execution. Just share your vision, and we’ll take care of the rest!

Consultation

Share your vision, needs, and preferences.

Custom Planning

We’ll design the perfect setup tailored to your occasion.

Flawless Execution

Sit back and relax while we handle everything from start to finish.

Corporate Catering for Every Occasion.

Planning a family reunion, corporate function, or a special occasion? Let us handle the details and create a truly memorable event for you.

At Suja’s Kitchen, we believe food has the power to bring people together. That’s why we craft every meal with warmth, care, and the kind of flavor that reminds you of home. Whether it’s a busy workday lunch or a thoughtful spread for your next team event, we’re here to nourish your team with food that feels good and tastes even better.

item.title: snibbles
item.dc:creator: Sujas
item.content:encoded:
Snibbles by Suja's Kitchen

A bite of Kerala. A taste of home.

Snibbles is Suja’s latest love letter to those who miss home. Inspired by decades of comforting meals, each bite is crafted to bring Kerala a little closer, wherever you are.

http://sujaskitchen.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/closeup-of-banana-chips-shows-crispy-texture-and-t-2025-08-04-04-45-30-utc_1.mp4

Why Snibbles?

Made with care,

just like home cooking.

Made with care,

just like home cooking.

Made with care,

just like home cooking.

Bring home the taste of Kerala in every bite.

Freshly made, lovingly packed, and ready to reach your doorstep — order your Snibbles today and relive the flavors of home.

Order Now

item.title: Onam Catering
item.dc:creator: Sujas
item.content:encoded:
Onam Catering

Celebrate Onam with a Feast Worth Sharing

A traditional Kerala Sadhya — crafted to bring people together, wherever they are.

Pre-Book Your Onam Sadhya Now
  • +971 5284 07397

Why Choose Us?

Authentic, home-cooked Kerala feast delivered to your door

This Onam, bring your teams and communities together over a traditional Kerala feast — made convenient.
Suja’s Kitchen presents a full-scale Sadhya experience with over 25 vegetarian dishes, thoughtfully packed and laid out for seamless group service. Perfect for corporate offices, alumni gatherings, and community celebrations, our catering brings the spirit of Kerala straight to your event space.

  • Convenient setups tailored for offices, homes, and events
  • Expert support to plan and coordinate your order
  • Flavourful, vegetarian menu that appeals across cultures
  • Professionally delivered across the UAE
https://youtube.com/shorts/Qfs4mPrzV1U?si=GDHvmY8Hu8fbXFmr

What’s in the Sadhya

  • Over 25 Dishes. One Time-Honoured Tradition.
  • From crisp banana chips to rich, creamy payasam
  • Parippu, Sambar, Rasam, Mambazham Kalan, Avial, Erissery, Olan, Pachadi, Kichadi, Theeyal Thiyal, Thoran, Lemon Naranga Pickle, Mango Pickle, Inji Curry, Ghee, Salt, Kootu Curry, Pappadam, Upperi, Sharkara Upperi, Buttermilk, Palakkadan Matta Rice, Pazham, Palada Payasam, Parippu Payasam​

Highlight

  • 100% Vegetarian
  • Banana Leaf Included
  • Packaged for Easy Group Service

Best Suited For:

  • Corporate Offices
  • Alumni Groups
  • Associations & Cultural Communities
  • Celebrations

Delivery & Booking Info

We’ll be delivering Sadhyas all the way till Onam!

Serving Options

Individual Onam Meal

Areas Covered

Dubai and Abu Dhabi

Booking Deadline:

Preparation time 24 Hours
